entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • With wasi-experimental, could not find wasi-sdk when trying to publish wasi-wasm console application error - a workaround proposal #110111
  • FusedMultiplyAdd not using all available instructions #110109
    Future
  • Question about proper CancellationToken usage within awaitable methods #110108
  • SPMI replay failure: Assertion failed 'instructionSetFlags.Equals(EnsureInstructionSetFlagsAreValid(instructionSetFlags)) during Pre-Import #110106
  • How to implement gcc __attribute__((constructor)) when compiling dynamic libraries under Linux #110102
  • [browser/WASM + .NET9] why is the garbage collector still not doing its job? #110100
  • net9.0, coreclr.dll exception code: 0xc0000602 #110099

Closed

  • `HashTable` use in code emitted by `[GeneratedRegex]` #110112
  • Incorrect PInvoke definition will implicitly modify context local variable #110110
  • Incorrect buffer size check in Convert.TryToHexString / Convert.TryToHexStringLower #110094

PullRequests

Created

  • Clean up in LowerFusedMultiplyAdd #110113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ordering issue in interface trimming #110098
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

Merged

  • JIT: filter local assertion set #110091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Move MonoClass:inlinearray_value out of MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Help finding Brotli headers when doing VMR build under FreeBSD #110079
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #109996
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Unhandled exception handler. #109806
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • JIT: implied Boolean range assertions for local prop #109481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110097
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Only define _XOPEN_SOURCE in configurecompiler.cmake (for consistency) #110092
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Handle hot/cold map lookup in `ExecutionManager.ReadyToRunJitManager.GetMethodInfo` #110087
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test ItUsesArtifactsOutputPathForPublish intermittently hangs in CI #45057

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for `dotnet sln add file` and `dotnet sln add folder` #45072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not create custom instances of TestAssetsManager in tests, use SdkTest base instead #45071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45060
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Disable test ItUsesArtifactsOutputPathForPublish #45058
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Split GivenThatWeWantToRunILLink test class into multiple so Helix can run them separately #45056
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Use WebAssemblyHotReloadCapabilities project property #45055
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #45053
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Use temp directory as TestExecutionDirectory in RunTestsOnHelix.sh #45022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • format: stop checking for dotnet cli version #44958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Infallible var pattern causes "not all code paths return a value" #76059
  • Area - Completion - 2 #76056
  • Area - Completion #76055

Closed

  • Do not open Intellisense on full-line deletion #69885
    Backlog
  • Closing parenthesis of pointer-type cast is colored incorrectly #68536
    18.0
  • `CodeGenerationAttributeData` violates the expected nullability contract of its base type `AttributeData` #70592
  • Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #69869
    Backlog
  • Automatic refactoring produces wrong code for async partial void #70063
    Backlog
  • Why does code clean up automatically implement interfaces #69991
    Backlog
  • Alt+F1 for peek hints cannot be rebound to a different shortcut #69886
    Backlog
  • KeyNotFoundException thrown by FindSymbols.StreamingProgressCollector.OnReferenceFoundAsync #69780
    18.0
  • IntelliSense fails to capture enclosing local variables when editing a lambda expression, which persists when editing other non-lambda files in C#. #69753
    Backlog
  • When saving, some Code Cleanup fixers modify C# source files excluded from compilation #69512
    Backlog
  • Analyzer to warn if primary constructor parameters are mutated #69489
    18.0
  • CS9169 is not reported for record structs with InlineArray attribute #69402
    18.0
  • IDE0046 suggestion: option to ignore else-if statements #69312
    Backlog
  • NuGet-installed diagnostic suppressors should be able to suppress VSIX-installed analyzer diagnostics #75399
  • Remove Unnecessary Usings is modifying white space before first type declaration #65114
    Backlog
  • Anonymous objects are clickable inside quick info, but lead to nowehre #67185
    Backlog
  • Sticky Scroll Issue for Nested Switch Cases #68467
    Backlog
  • Refactor code to specified region #68466
    Backlog
  • Smart break line should support `ForEachVariableStatementSyntax` #66102
    Backlog
  • Sticky Scroll still thinks it is in try block #68340
    18.0
  • Customize Go To Definition for Source Generated types and members #68294
    18.0
  • VS 2022 constantly complains about inconsistent line ends #68236
  • EditorConfig not taken into account if the filename is not `.editorconfig` #68130
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Support URIs as a first class document property #68083
    18.0
  • Peek to definition on a definition is kinda useless #68079
    Backlog
  • "View in Object Browser" seems to be missing #67938
    Backlog
  • Nullable warnings not appearing in IDE #67839
    18.0
  • If option is sended to LSP client, its name and group name need to be frozen #67714
    Backlog
  • Outlining - Collapse #regions on file open not working #67463
    Backlog
  • Tracking item for IDE experience changes around source generators. #67441
    Backlog
  • Formatting toolbar should work in code window #67404
    18.0
  • Suggestions for setting 'var' preferences code style in C# editor #67403
    18.0
  • `Simplifier.AddImportsAnnotation` does not work with Attributes #67237
    Backlog
  • Add partial classes view in margin menu #67169
    Backlog
  • "Implement interface explicitly" fixer implements conversion operators implicitly #61263
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35522.57 #76047

PullRequests

Created

  • Support ExperimentalAttribute.Message #76060
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix formatting when making an accessor readonly #76054
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add a helper to determine if a type has a specific attribute or not. #76053
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not offer to remove the primary field from an inline array #76052
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [Draft] Update Razor DynamicFile Provider #76050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue producing interpolated strings from char literals #76049
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update Copilot rename telemetry #76045
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • VBOverloadResolutionPriority: break attribute binding cycles, clone a bunch of C# tests #76008
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • fix Inline temporary variable adds unnecessary cast #70423
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Include project diagnostic suppressors in host analyzer execution (target main) #76037
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76051
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove imports should only format the section of the document that was touched #76038
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Anonymous types in quick info should not have navigation links #76048
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix missed case in automatic line ending #76041
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix explicit generation of static conversion methods in interfaces #76022
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #76046
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Update data for snap 17.13P2 #76033
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update 'implement interface' to forward explicit members to implicit ones #76044
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: https #59117
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #59116

Merged

    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

    Perf, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unwanted Top and Bottom Spacing in .NET MAUI iOS Simulator #26080
  • CurrentCulture region not read correctly from device (iOS 18.0) #26079
  • WebAuthenticator relogin without showing loging dialog from OAuth Provider #26078
  • [XAML/IntelliSense] IntelliSense support for Bindings in XAML #26077
  • [XAML] Compile Errors for invalid references in XAML #26076
  • Deploy option not available in net9 maui demo on Win 11 #26075
  • Running an Android app with R8 shrinking results in Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: FragmentManager has not been attached to a host. #26074

Closed

  • Decimal point on numeric keyboard not working since Net8.0 #19655
  • FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory returns different path after updating to latest version #25981
    .NET 9 SR2

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 17 #26081
    community ✨

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Windows] Hide/show titlebar on modal pages #26073
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.6.1 to 1.6.3 #25977
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [Windows] `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` returns different path after updating to latest version - fix #26039
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2

Updated

  • Fix grid not getting invalidated when changing the Height/Width of Row/ColumnDefinitions declared with the short syntax #26046
    area-layout, community ✨
  • Fix memory leak on repeated Animations #25232
    area-animation, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS][Regression] Fix ToolbarItem color when used with IconImageSource is always default color #26048
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 11 #25855
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Fall back to loading .NET 8 date strings #26033
    area-essentials, .NET 9 SR2
  • Changing shape background color with dataTrigger #25544
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed Using safe area causes white area at the top upon entry focus #26063
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Hide/show titlebar on modal pages #26071
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Updated the Blazor Hybrid Solution template to work better with the dotnet cli or IDEs that rely on it. #25997
    area-blazor, area-templates, community ✨
  • Always propagate the BC to the ControlTemplate #26072
    .NET 9 SR2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos DateTime Serialization #35189
  • Bug Report: Unexpected Behavior When Removing Non-Tracked Entities in Entity Framework #35188
  • Depend on the right version of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis #35187
    10.0.0
  • How to turn off protection against concurrent migrations #35186
  • Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key') issue on Concurrent/Duplicate updates #35185
  • What does this mean and how can it be resolved properly? Package 'Microsoft.AspNet.Mvc 5.2.8' was restored using '...' instead of the project target framework 'net8.0'. This package may not be fully compatible with your project. #35184

Closed

  • Calling Migrate on a database containing tables but no history throws #35181
